name: GB Space Jump -2.0
description:
A small Super Mario clone prototype with GB Studio 2 and part of my small devlog series of the GB Studio Clone Challenge. This is the downgrade of GB Space Jump, which I originally developed in GB Studio 3. But due to a bug that disabled the game to detect collissions, I decided to rebuild and finish this prototype in GB Studio 2. The old (and incomplete) files of the GB Studio 3 version are still available on the original project page. So feel free to give it a try. 

https://hellfansing.itch.io/gb-space-jump

GB Space Jump -2.0 on YouTube:


Controls: 

------------

Motion - (<-) (->) // [A], [D].

Jump - (A) // [K]

Shooting - (B) // [J]

Use Upgrade - (Select) // [Shift].
